author: Gaye Cunnane
title: Doctors on Covid-19 frontline: ‘What I miss most is normal human contact’
description: Life in hospitals has altered beyond recognition, writes Gaye Cunnane, professor of rheumatology at St James’s Hospital
content:
In a new online series, Dispatches from the frontlines, The Irish Times will share the stories and experiences of healthcare staff and other frontline workers during the Covid-19 crisis. If you would like to take part, click here.
